actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to provide relief to the Santa Ynez River Water Conservation District due to delivery of water to the Santa Ynez Indian Reservation lands.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to relieve the Santa Ynez Water Conservation District, California of payments due the United States for repayment of a Small Reclamation Projects loan in the amount of $1,120 per year due to the delivery of water to the Santa Ynez Indian Reservation lands within such district.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to provide relief to the Santa Ynez River Water Conservation District due to delivery of water to the Santa Ynez Indian Reservation lands.
